                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'opener' , '' ) != '' )
                        {
                              $Selector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' );
                              $DataSource = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_source' , $Selector );

get_records ( &$  Settings  )

Returns:
Records.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 156 of file jquery_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $PackageName = $Settings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
                        $PackageVersion = $Settings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                        $FunctionName = $Settings->get_setting( 'access_function_name' , 'simple_select' );
                        
                        $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
                        
                        if( method_exists( $Package , $FunctionName ) )
                        {
                              return( call_user_func( array( $Package , $FunctionName ) ) );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              throw( 
                                    new Exception( "Function '$FunctionName' does not exists in the package '$PackageName'" )
                              );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 110 of file jquery_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Limitations = array( 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'accordion_section' , $Limitations ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );

                              $Code = '<h3><a href="#">{lang:'.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' ).'}</a></h3>';
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{accordion_section:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

$Changed - Was the processing completed.

array( $Str , $Changed ).

Exception An exception of this type is thrown.

Definition at line 850 of file jquery_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'add_iframe_tab' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $Tab = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'add_iframe_tab.tpl' );

                              $Selector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' , '' );
                              $Tab = str_replace( '{id}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , $Selector ) , $Tab );
                              $Tab = str_replace( '{url}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'url' ) , $Tab );
                              $Tab = str_replace( '{title}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' , 'title' ) , $Tab );
                              $Tab = str_replace( '{index}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'index' , -1 ) , $Tab );
                              $Tab = str_replace( '{height}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'height' , 'auto' ) , $Tab );
                              $Tab = str_replace( 
                                    '{closable}' , 
                                    $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'closable' , false ) !== false ? 'true' : 'false' , $Tab
                              );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{add_iframe_tab:$Parameters}" , $Tab , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'add_opener' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'opener' );
                              
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'before_open_validation' , 'nop' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'data_source' , '' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'data_acceptor' , '' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'status_acceptor' , '' );
                              
                              $AddOpenerScript = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'add_opener.tpl' );
                              $Data = $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings();
                              $AddOpenerScript = $this->String->print_record( $AddOpenerScript , $Data );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{add_opener:$Parameters}" , $AddOpenerScript , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'dialog' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $this->prepare_data_for_dialog();
                              
                              $DialogInitScript = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'dialog_init.tpl' );

                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'iframe_dialog' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              $ViewDialogScript = '<div id="'.$id.'"></div>{dialog:on_open=ultimix.IframeDialogOnOpen( \''.$id.
                                                            '\' );before_open_validation=function()[lfb]return(ultimix.'.
                                                            'IframeDialogInit( \''.$id.'\' , \''.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'href' 
                                                            , '/' ).'\' ) )[rfb];selector=#'.$id.';'.
                                                            $this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().'}';

process_select_dialog ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'select_dialog'.

Parameters:
$Str - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $Str , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 321 of file jquery_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'select_dialog' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $DataSource = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_source' , md5( rand().microtime( true ) ) );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'data_source' , $DataSource );
                              
                              $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'id' , $id );
                              
                              $ViewDialogScript = '{select_dialog_content:'.$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().
                                                            '}{dialog:selector=#'.$id.';'.$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().
                                                            ';cancel=true;ok_processor=ultimix.ExtractSimpleSelectResult}';
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{select_dialog:$Parameters}" , $ViewDialogScript , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

Definition at line 264 of file jquery_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'select_dialog_content' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $SimpleRecords = $this->select_dialog_content( $this->BlockSettings );
                              
                              $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              
                              $Type = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'type' , 'simple' );
                              $ViewDialogScript = $Type == 'simple' ? 
                                    $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'simple_select_dialog.tpl' ) : '';
                              
                              $ViewDialogScript = str_replace( '{id}' , $id , $ViewDialogScript );
                              $ViewDialogScript = str_replace( '{records}' , $SimpleRecords , $ViewDialogScript );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{select_dialog_content:$Parameters}" , $ViewDialogScript , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }

process_view_dialog ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'view_dialog'.

Parameters:
$Str - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $Str , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 377 of file jquery_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'view_dialog' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              
                              if( isset( $this->Dialogs[ $id ] ) )
                              {
                                    $ViewDialogScript = '';
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $AllSettings = $this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings();
                                    $ViewDialogScript = "<div id=\"$id\">{direct_view:$AllSettings}</div>{dialog:selector=#$id;".
                                          "$AllSettings}";
                                    $this->Dialogs[ $id ] = true;
                              }
                              /* must be so to prevent multiple dialogs creation */
                              $Str = str_replace_once( "{view_dialog:$Parameters}" , $ViewDialogScript , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Records = $this->get_records( $this->BlockSettings );
                              
                        $DataSource = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 
                              'data_source' , md5( $PackageName.microtime( true ) )
                        );
                        $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , $DataSource );

                        $Checked = 'checked';
                        $SimpleRecords = '';
                        foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
                        {
                              $SimpleRecords = '<div style="height: 20px; white-space:nowrap; overflow: hidden;">'.
                                       '<input style="vertical-align: baseline; display: inline;" '.$Checked.
                                       ' type="radio" name="'.$Name.'" value="'.get_field( $v , 'id' ).'" id="'.
                                       $DataSource.get_field( $v , 'id' ).'">'.'<label style="margin-left: 2px; vertical-align: '.
                                       '3px; cursor: pointer; white-space:nowrap;" for="'.$DataSource.get_field( $v , 'id' ).'">'.
                                          get_field( $v , 'title' ).'</label></div>';
                              $Checked = '';
                        }
                        
                        return( $SimpleRecords );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
